item.title: Termine
item.description: 23.-25. April 2017, Big Sesshin, La Gendroniere La Gendroniere, 66666 Blois, France Contact: marcel.gluk@gmail.com Phone: +33 166 177 188 Information: Tesx 23.-25. item.title: The main event dates of the Zen Simple Assise network
item.description: Ango at La Saulsaie from July 26th to August 20th near Lyon 1st session led by Brigitte Seiriki Stark, 2nd session directed by Philippe Reiryu Coupey, 3rd session led by Bruno Kaiho Peslerbe. Flyer Please, subscribe to Ango preferably via the Online form The summer sesshin directed by Jean-Claude Reisaku Saint-Prix from 21 to July 23 in Burgundy Flyer The sesshin in Brittany led by Bruno Peslerbe on 20-21 May in Poullan sur Mer (29100)
